price: Na kwamba Yeye ndiye anaye leta kicheko na kilio.
footnotes: Na Yeye peke yake ni Mwenye uweza wa kuufanya uso uonyeshe furaha au maudhiko, na pia ni Mwenye kuziumba sababu za starehe na dhiki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
